header.description:
§⭕§7This addon allows you create custom scoreboards for all players by simply using the commands §l/title§r §7or §l/titleraw§r§7.

§dExample Commands:§r
§7/title @a title Hello World!
/title @a actionbar Welcome to my World!

§7Made By: §5PMK744#5874§7, §5Nobu#1122§7, and §5Bombo#0667§7.
header.name: §⭕§l§5ActionBoard v1.6.1
